oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Recipe for eye wash
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: One handwritten note, front and back, which has ingredients and instructions on to make eye wash for sore eyes. Recipe from Mrs. Rufus K. Polk.

Margaret Phillips Polk was the wife of Rufus King Polk (1866-1902) who was a Democratic member of the U.S. House of Representatives from Pennsylvania. He was born in Columbia, Tennessee, and attended Webb's Academy in Culleoka, Tennessee. Polk was related to Confederate States Army Brigadier General Lucius E. Polk (1833-1892), bishop and Lieutenant-General Leonidas Polk (1802-1864), and President James K. Polk (1795-1849).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Polk, Margaret Phillips
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Traditional medicine; Eye--Care and hygiene;
